Camarillo.Newbury Park High School: Newbury Park High School, founded in 1967, is a co-educational public high school located in Newbury Park, California. Newbury Park High School has approximately 2,585 students, 106 faculty, and 62 staff as of the 2013-14 year. Newbury Park High School is an International Baccalaureate World School and home of the Panthers.
